documents.document: @lenoretaylor Sweden's Deputy PM is a Green. So proud of her stand on climate and her feminist perspective.
Did Aust talk to Fiji about what action to take re granting asylum or sending refugee back to PNG? Need to clarify @JulieBishopMP #auspol
Here's an idea @BCA support Publish What You Pay so we can see how much your members pay to grease wheels for miners overseas #auspol
BCA is face of corporate greed and climate irresponsibility. Neoliberal cheerleaders'bid for lower corporate taxes should be ignored.#auspol
@jaraparilla @TurnbullMalcolm All who voted to repeal the carbon price committed a crime against the environment. No more back slapping.
Good on @SenatorSiewert, doing the hard yards in Senate for Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander people. https://t.co/pHTWyad0eA #auspol
@vicsaranmoore Then we need a strong show of support for @GreensMPs War Powers Bill. Lib/Lab/Nat don't support Parlt deciding. #auspol
Knitting Nannas have made yellow and black #LockTheGate caps symbol of anti #csg. Time to add https://t.co/n79o61RuGn for winter. #auspol
Any conversations between Aust and Fiji @JulieBishopMP pre snatching? Would have been embarrassing if Fiji had granted asylum.#auspol
#GrabYourWallet campaign starts in USA. Don't buy anything from Trump businesses. Plus women's solidarity. https://t.co/n79o61RuGn #auspol
@greensinspa @cunningham_cch Greens brought forward legislation to give Parlt war power but Lib Lab Nats opposed. This must change. #auspol
Perhaps now community sees need for Parlt to decide on sending Aust troops to war and not be left to PM. Appeasing Trump is pathway to war.
This is great idea for old fur coats and stoles, inherited but unwanted: Give them back to wildlife. https://t.co/PIaSFzDCMr #animalrescue
Republicans have overturned ban on people with severe mental illness owning guns. Gun culture gone mad. #auspol
In 1997 Howard and state premiers exempted forestry from Env Law for 20 yrs. Now Tas/Vic/Turnbull want to extend 20 more yrs. #EndRFA
This young man's life is in your hands @TurnbullMalcolm. Whatever happens to him on streets of PNG is down to you. https://t.co/Sj92oJJRZc
What is FIRB doing? Housing Affordability undermined by thousands of empty investment properties. Tax empty homes. https://t.co/YDnWve61oS
@guardianeco @readfearn As Treasurer Hockey organised a session at G20 in Aust for Peabody to present. Also invited Lomborg. #auspol
Aust distinguishes between facilitation fee and a bribe. Former legal, latter illegal. Mining, oil and gas pay "facilitation fees". #corrupt
Australia still does not require "publish what you pay"to grease palms of corrupt Governments. Blind eye for mates. https://t.co/wxGTjd7vpB
Tourism pressure one of drivers of degradation in World Heritage areas @WillHodgman https://t.co/E7BBVXRita #politas
ABC could have reversed decision to axe Catalyst but it didn't. Don't let management get away with not delivering on 17 docs. #Science
Remember ABC Catalyst? Remember the promise of 17 docs /1 hr to replace it? Pack of lies. It is Feb, when is Doc 1 Michelle Guthrie?#auspol
Opened Tas artist Di Masters exhibition, Undercurrents. 50% Earth's oxygen comes from plankton. Saving forests imp but so too oceans.#auspol
Does the U.S. Refugee deal require special forces to Iraq and Aust involvement in exercises in South China Sea? @TurnbullMalcolm #auspol
If Ministerial Responsibility still applied in Aust politics, Scott Morrison would have to resign. He has cost taxpayers $1m + #Auspol.
@AmbBleich Thank You for calling out moral cowardice of those who go along with the perpetrators of injustice. Aust now a Trump appeaser.
Greens from around world stand in solidarity with people of Canada who will not allow hate to overcome love and generosity. @ElizabethMay
Australia discriminates against people based on their mode of arrival, (boats) locks them up and bans them for life. @billshortenmp #auspol
Brandis must not be given os posting. The whole WA, Bell, ATO, Gleeson episode must be investigated seriously. #auspol
Man who bugged East Timor to be replaced by man who authorised seizure of documents and prevented witness from travelling to Hague. #auspol
How can Aust help green card holders stranded at airports? Is there a website/NGO getting organised? #auspol @GuardianAus
@lukemartin83 "outdated" is neoliberal code for "unavailable for private profit". How many focus groups to come up with that?
Trump's ban is illegal and appalling but also revealing that Saudi Arabia which finances terrorism is excluded. https://t.co/zksqwQwfJX
If you are appalled by Trump's ban, take action and condemn @TurnbullMalcolm lifetime ban on people who arrive by boat. Defeat it in Senate.
Given Aust dual nationals are banned, Turnbull cannot weasel out of raising issue with Trump in his call today. #auspol
@Jeff_Sparrow It must be condemned. Aust on same trajectory leading to Trump.Howard,Rudd,Gillard,Abbott, Morrison, Turnbull, Dutton.
Presumably many Australians affected by Trump dual national ban. https://t.co/d3FMu9vjOA What say you @TurnbullMalcolm ? #auspol
U.S. invades Iraq, bombs Syria displaces millions then bans refugees. Media focus on "homeland security" and not on chain of responsibility.
@43a6f0ce5dac4ea They don't have a "Wilderness" World Heritage Area. Commercial development should be outside boundaries.
Dig it up, cut it down and if you can't do that build a road into it or put a commercial cabin on it. Welcome to Hodgman's Tas Nat Parks.
"Outdated" used as excuse for undermining protection of Nat Parks in favour of commercial development. Culture yes; resorts no. #politas
Australian Labor and Liberal Govts have done this to a 17 year old.PMs /Mins move on without a worry. https://t.co/b677t7crLp #SeeYouInHague
Congratulations Mavis. Thank you for everything you have done for the community and our environment. #politas https://t.co/aJ42CsNTyY

If you stand for Green liveable cities and against #WestConnex #EastWestLink, then stand with people protecting Beeliar #NoRoe8 in WA.
So proud of all the people fighting to protect the Beeliar wetlands from destruction to make way for another road. Thank you. #NoRoe8
@JamesEltonPym Threats to people or property should be referred to police. Billboard company appears to be hosting RACV ad.What's RACV view?
Obama's $1b to Green Climate Fund is good but falls short of $3b pledged. #ParisAgreement https://t.co/egd5XxF1Pi #auspol
@QMS Make Australia Day for everyone. Reject racism. #PutItBackUp #auspol
Putting every cent of fuel excise increase into new roads has delivered cash for #WestConnex It was always bad idea. Lib/Lab voted for it.
QMS Media took down advert after being threatened. Why? Giving in to racists is cowardice. Profits more imp than principles? Put it back up.
@mohamad_sowaid @AustralisTerry @QMS should not have caved in to racism by removing Advert. Give your kids a hug.Tell them to stand tall.
@lenoretaylor It is time Clive Palmer's "feeding the chooks" was called out.
@GrogsGamut You forgot to add re this year's polo trip, dressed by Hugo Boss as guest of Alpha Romeo.
@Justpeachijo Good Question. Currently not there at all.
When are we going to have "dressed by" added to "guest of" in list of Parliamentary pecuniary interest disclosure? #auspol
@broomstick33 That is the problem. We need to take back democracy from corporates and not give in to them by filling Parlt with celebs.
As democracies have become plutocracies, elected MPs chase celebrity and become faces of their bosses, not the people who elected them.
"Two main uses of celebrity culture, corporate personification and mass distraction." Monbiot No wonder Aust politics morphing to celebrity.
Aust political expenses scandal. Celebrity as smiling face of corporate power. https://t.co/sB6YQBiMlU #auspol @GrogsGamut
Tesla offers lower home battery prices than AEMO predicted for 2040. Time for 100% RE analysis with realistic not conservative assumptions
Hard to believe that Aust Chief Scientist wants to slow roll out of renewables and not speed it up. @UNFCCC @Davos @billmckibben
Tell Chief Scientist Alan Finkel to stick with science and stop playing politics. We totally reject a cap on Renewable Energy. We want 100%.
@NotRorsta Opposing Australia going back into Iraq. @GreensMPs only ones to oppose Abbott's folly. Called for Parlt to decide on war, not PM
Vale Lord Snowden. His best work was Snowden Tasmania Essay 1981 which upset Robin Gray so much, he had it withdrawn and shredded. #politas
Keating is right. Aust needs to tell Trump that we will not be part of US adventurism. We should have done it #Iraq 2003, we must do it now.
30% of all vehicles sold in Norway in 2016 were electric. Australia is so far behind. https://t.co/sZV4Oj5ayj #auspol
National #ICAC and political donations reform go together.Set strict rules and enable transparent compliance/enforcement. #auspol #democracy
Nothing less than National #ICAC will do. Increase pressure on @billshortenmp @TurnbullMalcolm to agree. @GreensMPs fully support. #auspol
@virginsnowbunny Non violent direct action is appropriate response when all else has failed in face of Govt facilitated Env destruction.
